oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |gwai (a person who was formerly a beast of prey and a man of the Early Race) kills his sister-in-law and his brother-in-law is angry with him and seeks revenge (the title implies that |gwai is caught and killed but it does not happen in the story). 1) p.8197v: |han=kass'o heard this story from his maternal grandmother (=kammi), 2) See also The Ttu ttutten (birds), 3) This story is found in Book VIII-25.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The story of |gwai (who killed his sister-in-law, and was killed by his brother-in-law)
